Test Name: DELTA 9-CARBOXY-TETRAHYDROCANNABINOL (THC-COOH) Confirmation and Creatinine Ratio, Urine
Purpose: To confirm and quantify THC-COOH in urine and determine the THC-COOH/creatinine ratio for accurate assessment of cannabis metabolite excretion.
Equipment: Gas Chromatograph-Mass Spectrometer (GC-MS) or Liquid Chromatography-Tandem Mass Spectrometry (LC-MS/MS), analytical balance, centrifuge, pipettes, vortex mixer, spectrophotometer
